p.o: “Chatterton the marvellous boy, the sleepless soul who perished in his prime.”

p.w: ‘Huts of the Raising of the School Age’

p.o: “I believe in mixed schools but, my God, not when they’re as mixed as this.”
“A primitive caveman if ever I saw one.”

p.w: “I must not chatter in the classroom”
“I must not look as if I am chattering in the classroom.”

p.o: Vive l’amour, Vive l’amour, Vive la compagnie!
“I don’t think you have read my book. In fact I’m inclined to believe that you have not even seen my book.”
The Story of Arthur the Rat
“Please sir, were you that funny little man Drooby in the film Rockets Galore?”
“Please sir, the auld fella at the back wants oot!”
